Entries.26220101/w rainy/r 0.5: continue/13 15/farmer -100 100 0 Si_MR_Morris 13 12 1/skippable/fade/addConversationTopic SiMorrisReturns 4/pause 200/textAboveHead Si_MR_Morris "What am I going to do..."/warp farmer 0 23/pause 100/move farmer 13 0 1/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 2/emote Si_MR_Morris 16/speak Si_MR_Morris "Farmer @! I'm so happy to see you!"/faceDirection farmer 0/move farmer 0 -3 0 true/move Si_MR_Morris 0 2 2/speak Si_MR_Morris "Please help me!$3#$b#After Joja Mart left town, I lost everything!$3#$b#I was fired from my job, my wife divorced me, and she kicked me out of the house!$3#$b#Please, you've got to help me. I have nowhere else to go...$3"/pause 300/question fork0 "#Serves you right after everything you've done.#Fine, I'll help you."/fork helpFault/pause 300/friendship Si_MR_Morris 60/jump Si_MR_Morris/speak Si_MR_Morris "Really? You mean it?#$b#Thank you so much Farmer @! You won't regret it!"/emote farmer 40/end/fade
Entries.helpFault: speak Si_MR_Morris "It's not my fault!$3#$b#All I did was accept a branch manager position, and they moved me out here!$3#$b#Please, I'm begging you...$3"/emote farmer 40/end/fade

Entries.26220102/f Si_MR_Morris 500/p Linus/w su: continue/24 24/farmer 38 23 3 Si_MR_Morris 25 24 2 Linus 23 9 2/skippable/fade/move farmer -5 0 3/move Linus 0 15 1/pause 500/jump Si_MR_Morris/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 3/speak Si_MR_Morris "ACK!$3#$b#Don't startle me like that!$3#$b#I could have fallen!$3"/speak Linus "I'm sorry, I didn't mean to frighten you.#$b#I thought I would offer you some food."/addObject 24 24 280/pause 500/emote Si_MR_Morris 16/speak Si_MR_Morris "Eurgh... What is this sludge?$3"/speak Linus "It's freshly foraged."/emote Si_MR_Morris 12/speak Si_MR_Morris "You picked this up off the ground?!$3#$b#That's disgusting!$3#$b#I'm not eating that!$3"/pause 500/speak Linus "Oh, I see.#$b#Forgive me."/removeObject 24 24/move Linus 0 -15 0/pause 500/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 0/move farmer -7 0 3/move farmer 0 1 3/question fork0 "#That wasn't very nice.#That was extremely rude.#How dare you talk to Linus like that!"/jump Si_MR_Morris/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 1/speak Si_MR_Morris "What? I couldn't eat it! Would you?$3"/emote farmer 12/speak Si_MR_Morris "Fine, fine!$3#$b#I'll go apologize to him.$3#$b#But I'm still not eating it!$3"/end/fade

Entries.26220103/e 26220102/w sunny/f Si_MR_Morr: continue/24 50/farmer -100 100 0 Linus 20 57 3 Si_MR_Morris 29 61 0/skippable/fade/move Si_MR_Morris 0 -3 3/move Si_MR_Morris -7 0 3/move Si_MR_Morris 0 -1 3/faceDirection Linus 1/emote Linus 8/pause 500/speak Si_MR_Morris "Ugh, look.$3#$b#I'm sorry, alright?$3#$b#I shouldn't have called your food disgusting.$3#$b#It was a... generous... offer.$3"/pause 500/speak Linus "That's alright.#$b#I know folks like you are used to a different way of living."/pause 500/speak Linus "Would you still like some?"/pause 500/speak Si_MR_Morris "Um...$3#$b#Uhh...$3#$b#Eurgh, fine. I didn't like it.$3"/speak Linus "It's okay.#$b#I'm glad you tried it.$1"/end/fade

Entries.26220104/w rainy/d Wed/e 26220103/p Si_M: continue/33 13/farmer 33 19 0 Si_MR_Morris 24 9 2 Lewis -100 100 2/skippable/fade/addConversationTopic SiMorrisCC 4/pause 400/emote Si_MR_Morris 40/move farmer 0 -6 3/pause 300/emote farmer 8/pause 200/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 1/pause 200/speak Si_MR_Morris "What do you want?$3"/pause 200/playSound doorClose/warp Lewis 32 23/move Lewis 0 -9 0 true/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/speak Lewis "Ah, Mr. Morris. How are things going?"/pause 200/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 2/pause 200/speak Si_MR_Morris "Terrible!$3#$b#I've been trying to get a job, but no one in this town in hiring!$3"/speak Lewis "I'm sure you'll find something."/pause 200/emote Si_MR_Morris 40/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 1/pause 400/move Si_MR_Morris 8 0 0 true/speak Si_MR_Morris "This place is a mess.$3"/pause 200/speak Si_MR_Morris "There are footprints all over the floor!$3"/pause 600/speak Si_MR_Morris "Look at this fireplace, it's covered in soot.$3"/move Si_MR_Morris -4 0 3/move Si_MR_Morris 0 3 2/move Si_MR_Morris -6 0 0/move Si_MR_Morris -15 0 0 true/move farmer -13 0 3 true/move Lewis -6 0 3 true/viewport move -7 0 3000 true/speak Si_MR_Morris "I can't believe you ran Joja Mart out of town for this dump.$3"/speak Lewis "Have you tried asking Pierre for work?"/pause 200/speak Si_MR_Morris "He laughed at me when I did.$3"/pause 400/speak Si_MR_Morris "Why hasn't anyone put away their dishes?$3"/pause 200/move Si_MR_Morris 0 2 2/move Si_MR_Morris 5 0 2 true/speak Lewis "How about the museum?"/pause 200/speak Si_MR_Morris "They don't have the funds to hire anyone right now.$3"/pause 600/speak Si_MR_Morris "And someone's left the supplies all over the floor in here.$3"/pause 200/move Si_MR_Morris 16 0 1/move Si_MR_Morris 15 0 1 true/move farmer 16 0 1 true/viewport move 7 0 5000 true/pause 800/move Lewis 10 0 1 true/pause 500/question fork0 "#Maybe Willy could use a hand in his shop.#Maybe Marnie could use a hand on her farm."/pause 300/speak Si_MR_Morris "And deal with smelly creatures all day?"/pause 500/move Si_MR_Morris 1 0 1/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 0/pause 400/question fork0 "#Any other ideas?"/pause 500/emote Lewis 40/textAboveHead Lewis "Just one."/move Si_MR_Morris -5 0 3/speak Lewis "Morris, what if I hired you to keep this place clean and tidy?"/speak Si_MR_Morris "Me?$3#$b#A janitor?$3#$b#You've got to be joking.$3"/question fork0 "#It's a good opportunity. You should take it.#Beggars can't be choosers.#Stop whining, it's not like you have many other options."/emote Si_MR_Morris 40/pause 200/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 0/pause 200/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 1/pause 200/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 2/pause 200/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 3/pause 200/speak Si_MR_Morris "Ugh, fine.$3#$b#But there better be a benefits package included!$3"/emote Lewis 40/end/fade

Entries.26220105/e 26220104/w sunny/p Si_MR_Morr: continue/33 13/farmer -100 100 2 Si_MR_Morris 27 9 0 Penny -100 100 0/skippable/fade/pause 800/speak Si_MR_Morris "I can't believe I'm stuck doing such lowly work...$3"/warp Penny 33 23/playSound doorClose/move Penny 0 -8 0/speak Penny "Excuse me, I - Oh!#$b#Mr. Morris!"/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 2/emote Si_MR_Morris 12/speak Si_MR_Morris "What?$3"/speak Penny "Is it you who's been keeping the community center so clean lately?"/speak Si_MR_Morris "Yes. What about it?$3"/emote Penny 20/speak Penny "You've done a wonderful job.#$b#I'm so grateful!"/emote Si_MR_Morris 16/speak Si_MR_Morris "Oh, uh...$3#$b#Thanks I guess.$3"/emote Penny 32/speak Penny "It's nice to see you around town again!"/move Penny 0 8 0/playSound doorClose/warp Penny -100 100/pause 500/emote Si_MR_Morris 40/end/fade

Entries.26220106/e 26220105/w rainy/p Si_MR_Morr: continue/33 13/farmer -100 100 2 Pierre -100 100 2 Jodi -100 100 2 Si_MR_Morris 35 8 3/skippable/fade/pause 500/emote Si_MR_Morris 56/pause 200/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 32 23/move farmer 0 -7 0 true/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 2/pause 500/speak Si_MR_Morris "Hello farmer @!#$b#What brings you here today?"/pause 300/emote farmer 56/playSound doorClose/warp Pierre 33 23/move Pierre 0 -7 0/pause 500/jump Pierre/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Pierre "Ha! So it is true!$1#$b#You really are working in here now.$1"/pause 500/speak Si_MR_Morris "Yes, what about it?$3"/pause 500/speak Pierre "How does it feel to be a lowly janitor in a community center after your big shot job went bust?"/pause 500/emote Si_MR_Morris 12/pause 500/question fork0 "#That wasn't very nice Pierre. You should apologize.#That was extremely rude Pierre. Show some respect."/pause 500/emote Pierre 12/speak Pierre "Ugh, fine.$3#$b#I'm sorry I laughed at you.$2#$b#I think you're doing a pretty good job in here.$2"/emote Si_MR_Morris 32/speak Si_MR_Morris "Why thank you Pierre."/move Pierre 0 7 2/warp Pierre -100 100/playSound doorClose/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 300/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 3/emote Si_MR_Morris 40/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp Jodi 33 23 0/faceDirection Jodi 0/pause 300/emote Jodi 16/move Jodi 0 -7 0/speak Jodi "Morris!"/jump Si_MR_Morris/pause 500/speak Jodi "I'm glad I caught you before you left."/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 2/emote Si_MR_Morris 8/pause 500/addObject 33 15 224/speak Jodi "I cooked you some dinner to thank you for keeping this place so clean!"/pause 500/emote Si_MR_Morris 16/speak Si_MR_Morris "Oh! I, uh...$3#$b#Thank you very much.#$b#Jodi, was it?"/speak Jodi "That's right!$1#$b#Let me know if there's anything you need."/move Jodi 0 4 2/removeObject 33 15/move Jodi 0 3 2/warp Jodi -100 100/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/emote Si_MR_Morris 40/pause 500/playSound eat/pause 500/emote Si_MR_Morris 32/speak Si_MR_Morris "That was delicious."/end/fade

Entries.26220108/f Si_MR_Morris 2000/p Si_MR_Mor: continue/11 10/farmer -100 100 0 Si_MR_Morris 10 14 3 Harvey 9 14 1/skippable/fade/pause 500/speak Harvey "Your labor in the community center is certainly helping!#$b#You look much healthier since your first appointment."/speak Si_MR_Morris "I've never felt better doctor!#$b#I thought I'd hate being on my feet all day.#$b#But now all I want to do is walk around and enjoy the weather!"/pause 400/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 10 19/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 2/faceDirection Harvey 2/jump Si_MR_Morris/speak Si_MR_Morris "Farmer @! It's good to see you!"/speak Harvey "Hello @."/speak Si_MR_Morris "Dr. Harvey here has been giving me tips on how to lead a healthier lifestyle.#$b#I haven't felt so young in years!"/emote farmer 56/end/fade

Entries.26220109/f Si_MR_Morris 2000/p Si_MR_Mor: continue/50 13/farmer -100 100 2 Si_MR_Morris 64 14 3 Clint 63 14 0/skippable/fade/pause 500/emote Clint 40/pause 500/speak Si_MR_Morris "Well? How does it look?$3"/emote Clint 40/pause 500/speak Si_MR_Morris "Is it bad?$3"/pause 500/emote Clint 40/pause 500/emote Clint 16/speak Clint "And... Got it!"/playSound stoneCrack/speak Clint "There we go."/jump Si_MR_Morris/speak Si_MR_Morris "Did you fix it?$3#$b#Is it working now?$3"/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "Yeah.#$b#That leak shouldn't bother you anymore."/speak Si_MR_Morris "Wonderful!#$b#Thank you for your help."/speak Clint "Anytime."/pause 500/end/fade

Entries.26220111/p Si_MR_Morris/f Si_MR_Morris 2: continue/10 11/farmer 7 14 1 Si_MR_Morris 10 11 3/skippable/fade/pause 200/emote Si_MR_Morris 56/move farmer 3 0 0/emote Si_MR_Morris 16/pause 200/faceDirection Si_MR_Morris 2/pause 200/speak Si_MR_Morris "Farmer @! I'm sure you're wondering what I'm doing here."/emote farmer 8/speak Si_MR_Morris "I've decided to ease back on things a bit.#$b#I've spent so many years putting in my all, working overtime, rising to the top...$3#$b#I always thought that was the cost of success.$3"/pause 300/speak Si_MR_Morris "But because of you I've realized that true happiness isn't about success. It's about meaningful experiences, spending time with friends...#$b#And a good book!$1"/pause 300/speak Si_MR_Morris "Lewis let me change my schedule to only cleaning the Community Center a few days a week, so from now on, I'm spending the rest of my time enjoying life.#$b#It's funny. In a way, this is the most successful I've ever been.#$b#I never could have gotten to this point without you.#$b#So thank you, @.#$b#Thank you for everything."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/end/fade

Entries.26220110/f Si_MR_Morris 2500/e 26220107/: continue/24 12/Si_MR_Morris 28 9 1 Linus 30 9 3 farmer -100 100 2/skippable/fade/playSound cracklingFire/pause 400/speak Si_MR_Morris "These maki rolls are absolutely delicious!"/speak Si_MR_Morris "What's your secret, Linus?"/pause 400/speak Linus "It's all what the valley provides, Mr. Morris."/playSound cracklingFire/pause 400/speak Linus "You know, you've come a long way since you returned here."/speak Si_MR_Morris "It was pretty tough, I admit.$3"/speak Si_MR_Morris "But I guess this is a pretty good place for starting over."/playSound cracklingFire/pause 500/speak Linus "For what it's worth, I'm proud of you."/pause 400/playSound cracklingFire/pause 100/playSound cracklingFire/end/fade

Entries.26220119/e 26220118/w sunny/t 900 1800/p: continue/96 55/farmer 95 55 0 Si_MR_Morris 97 55 0 Lewis 96 55 0/addConversationTopic SiMorrisEcon 14/skippable/fade/pause 300/speak Lewis "I'm proud of how well the movie theater is doing.#$b#It's become a significant part of our community building efforts."/pause 200/speak Si_MR_Morris "I'm glad you've found a use for the old Joja building.#$b#But was this really the most practical application for it?$3#$b#You could have built a proper school, or a larger hospital, or expanded the museum.$3#$b#A movie theater won't generate much revenue in such a small town.$3"/pause 200/speak Lewis "I thought you'd moved past focusing on profit, Morris."/pause 200/speak Si_MR_Morris "I have.$3#$b#But you have a town to run Lewis!$3#$b#Building a community requires resources, you can't just expect everything to fall in your lap by way of luck or philanthropy.$3#$b#I've seen Pelican Town's financial reports, and there are plenty of ways the funds could be used much more effectively.$3"/pause 200/emote Lewis 40/pause 200/speak Lewis "I don't know...#$b#@, what do you think?"/pause 200/quickQuestion #I think we should give him a chance.#I'm not sure if we should give him any financial responsibilities.(break)speak Si_MR_Morris "I won't let you down, you'll see!$1"(break)speak Si_MR_Morris "I'll show you!$3#$b#I'm going to help you whether you like it or not!"/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.26220120/e 26220119/w sunny/p Si_MR_Morr: continue/51 10/farmer 50 12 0 Si_MR_Morris 52 5 3 Lewis 51 12 0/skippable/fade/pause 300/emote Si_MR_Morris 56/pause 200/speak Lewis "You know, he's actually doing a good job handling the town accounts.#$b#He's improved our economic flow and earmarked funds for various events and improvements.#$b#And he does seem happy to be putting that MBA to good use for our community."/pause 100/move Si_MR_Morris 0 2 3/move Si_MR_Morris -5 0 0 true/emote Lewis 40/pause 200/emote Si_MR_Morris 56/move Si_MR_Morris 0 -2 0/speak Lewis "I guess it all worked out.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 100/move Si_MR_Morris 0 1 3/move Si_MR_Morris -1 0 0/emote Si_MR_Morris 56/speak Lewis "He's still pretty smug about it though...$5"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 100/emote Si_MR_Morris 56/end/fade
